name: Dream Stories
description:
The game is still in development. We'll try to update it everyday in the game jam periods. Sadly, the title of the game is still not decided yet. So, the link of the game may vary.

This game was made for Smile Game Builder Game Jam Summer 2020! and made using Smile Game Builder.

note :

The web version of clock puzzle can't show some map properly. But, just go straight from there and you can go to the other map. Or you can play the desktop version where it can be shown properly.

The themes that were taken for the game jam are :

  • Love : Mother that loves her daughter is trying to make a bedtime story for her daughter.
  • Art : Interesting puzzles about arts.
  • Default Battle System Turned Off!

How to play :

Keyboard

  • Arrows/WASD : Movement
  • Hold shift + Move : Run
  • Esc/X : Menu
  • Enter/Z : Confirm
  • Q/E : Rotates camera horizontally
  • R/F : Rotates camera vertically
  • C/V : Zoom in/Zoom out
  • B : First Person/Third Person
  • K : Reset Camera Position
